casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

March, 1980

(March 28, 1980)* W. T. Grant Company, Respondent, v Robert Srogi, as Commissioner of Assessment of City of Syracuse, Appellant. (Appeal No. 3.)

Not published with other decisions of March, 1980, 74 AD2d 990. [Rep.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted and question certified. Present—Cardamone, J. P., Simons, Doerr and Witmer, JJ.
